docs.snippet: Ireland coach Joe Schmidt named fit again flanker Sean O'Brien in a strong Irish pack to face Scotland on Saturday but said he may be without injured flyhalf Johnny Sexton for the opening two Six Nations games....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ireland coach Joe Schmidt named fit again flanker Sean O'Brien in a strong Irish pack to face Scotland on Saturday but said he may be without injured flyhalf Johnny Sexton for the opening two Six Nations games.

headline.main: Ireland's O'Brien Back for Scotland, Sexton a Doubt for Italy
headline.print_headline: Ireland's O'Brien Back for Scotland, Sexton a Doubt for Italy

docs.snippet: Romania's ruling Social Democrat party leader Liviu Dragnea said on Thursday that Prime Minister Sorin Grindeanu has unanimous backing as premier among senior party members who have gathered to discuss recent domestic political developments....
docs.lead_paragraph: Romania's ruling Social Democrat party leader Liviu Dragnea said on Thursday that Prime Minister Sorin Grindeanu has unanimous backing as premier among senior party members who have gathered to discuss recent domestic political developments.

headline.main: Romania's Ruling Party Chief: Prime Minister Grindeanu Has Unanimous Backing
headline.print_headline: Romania's Ruling Party Chief: Prime Minister Grindeanu Has Unanimous Backing

docs.snippet: The Czech Republic's foreign minister says that a successful hacking attack on his email account and the accounts of dozens of ministry officials took place for months....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Czech Republic's foreign minister says that a successful hacking attack on his email account and the accounts of dozens of ministry officials took place for months.

headline.main: Czech Foreign Minister: Ministry Email Hack Took Months
headline.print_headline: Czech Foreign Minister: Ministry Email Hack Took Months

docs.snippet: Eleven civilians were killed in four separate air strikes by the U.S.-led coalition fighting Islamic State in Iraq and Syria between Oct. 25 and Dec. 9, the U.S. military said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Eleven civilians were killed in four separate air strikes by the U.S.-led coalition fighting Islamic State in Iraq and Syria between Oct. 25 and Dec. 9, the U.S. military said on Thursday.

headline.main: Eleven Civilians Killed in Air Strikes in Iraq, Syria: U.S. Military
headline.print_headline: Eleven Civilians Killed in Air Strikes in Iraq, Syria: U.S. Military

docs.snippet: Poland has published the names of some 8,500 guards and commanders who worked at Auschwitz, as part of a government drive to remind the world the death camp was run and staffed by Germans....
docs.lead_paragraph: Poland has published the names of some 8,500 guards and commanders who worked at Auschwitz, as part of a government drive to remind the world the death camp was run and staffed by Germans.

headline.main: Poland Publishes List of Auschwitz Guards to Show They Were German
headline.print_headline: Poland Publishes List of Auschwitz Guards to Show They Were German

docs.snippet: I’d urge everyone who disdains reflexive partisanship to avoid the lure of wishful thinking....
docs.lead_paragraph: I’d urge everyone who disdains reflexive partisanship to avoid the lure of wishful thinking.

docs.snippet: A video showing a reporter being grabbed by security men and hustled away after asking a question of National Front leader Marine Le Pen circulated on the Internet on Thursday amid confusion over the circumstances of the incident....
docs.lead_paragraph: A video showing a reporter being grabbed by security men and hustled away after asking a question of National Front leader Marine Le Pen circulated on the Internet on Thursday amid confusion over the circumstances of the incident.

headline.main: Video Shows French Reporter Dragged Off as He Questions Le Pen
headline.print_headline: Video Shows French Reporter Dragged Off as He Questions Le Pen

docs.snippet: Britain will do its utmost to negotiate a divorce deal with the European Union that is mutually beneficial, Brexit minister David Davis said on Thursday, setting out the government's strategy in an official policy document....
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain will do its utmost to negotiate a divorce deal with the European Union that is mutually beneficial, Brexit minister David Davis said on Thursday, setting out the government's strategy in an official policy document.

headline.main: Britain Will Try to Negotiate Amicable EU Divorce: Brexit Paper
headline.print_headline: Britain Will Try to Negotiate Amicable EU Divorce: Brexit Paper

docs.snippet: Yemeni security officials said on Thursday that warships, which they believe to be American, have been firing cannons and rockets at al-Qaida militants in the country's southern coastal areas....
docs.lead_paragraph: Yemeni security officials said on Thursday that warships, which they believe to be American, have been firing cannons and rockets at al-Qaida militants in the country's southern coastal areas.

headline.main: Yemen Officials Say US Warships Fired on Al-Qaida; US Denies
headline.print_headline: Yemen Officials Say US Warships Fired on Al-Qaida; US Denies
